Section.Catchline: Electronic health records system adoption loan program.

Subsection.Text: Subject to the availability of eligible donations from public or private entities and funding made available through s. 3014 of the Public Health Service Act, the agency may operate a certified electronic health record technology loan fund subject to a specific appropriation as authorized by the General Appropriations Act or as provided through the provisions of s. 216.181(11)(a) and (b).
The agency shall adopt rules related to standard terms and conditions for use in the loan program.
